thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Arthur

author: Arthur
title: Arthur
text: I ordered two snowboards from Erik's, and one came well packaged, the other was poorly packaged with 20% of the snowboard tip sticking out of the box. It looked deliberate, but the customer service at Erik's was quick to respond and said that it was not how they packaged it. Long story short, I was given a bit of a refund because of the packaging, and they were fast to make things right. I trust them and would go back for my next purchase.
